title: 2+ Yrs of this imaginary TRIBUNAL "TESTING" what a joke!
body:
proof this was said 2 + years ago http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2747&page=1

quote by MasterMirkinen Country Manager - Oceania: 

"True. All reports are stored. Once the tribunal will be up, players will be able to start judging cases from the very beginning."

If any riot fanbois still believe that ima lmfao! 

Entire AAA games have been made from scratch whilst this imaginary punishment system/tribunal is being "internally tested" hahaha!

Apparently I'm going to be called a troll! But if trolling is stating FACTS, then I'm a troll alright :)

replies.body:
Ah yes because you can squeeze out a AAA game in just a year and a half. That's how far back the posts on the new Tribunal that is in development go back from what I can find.
Here's a hint, as fucking shitty as COD is, even that has at least four years development on each game.

Yes you are a troll, why? Because you want to start up shit for the sake of starting up shit.
We've been guaranteed over and over again that the reports are being stored, and we've even had the ban waves that come from players being reported too much.

And yes, so imaginary all the threads that pop up on NA from salty rule breakers who keep getting banned by the auto-systems they test over there.


Also where are the facts you're stating? All I see is you mocking information you've been given and not stating any facts at all.

Are you thick or work for riot?

at least 4 years for AAA call of duty? Stop smoking crack! 

3 years proof here http://www.polygon.com/2014/2/6/5387530/call-of-duty-moving-to-3-year-3-studio-dev-cycle-sledgehammer-on-2014

That's for a FULL GAME not a TRIBUNAL LOL! 

Riot spends MILLIONS YES MILLIONS ON PRIZEMONEY BUT THEY CAN'T HIRE MORE PEOPLE TO WORK ON SOMETHING THAT THE ENTIRE COMMUNITY HAS BEEN ASKING FOR 2 YEARS+++

Goes to show how much they care!

I hear you that it's frustrating it has taken this long. To be clear, the Tribunal is coming, it's currently offline on all servers while it's being upgraded. It's also important to keep in mind that there are systems active right now. 

We have chat restrictions, LeaverBuster and Intentional Feeder Detection. You can read more about them here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq?sort_type=recent

The quote you linked is from 2 years ago. Soon after that we implemented the chat restriction system which evaluates reports. 

Reports are being used right now for the current systems and when Tribunal comes they will be used for that as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wIBnrpfF,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-04-30T18:33:18.507+0000)
>
> I hear you that it's frustrating it has taken this long. To be clear, the Tribunal is coming, it's currently offline on all servers while it's being upgraded. It's also important to keep in mind that there are systems active right now. 
> 
> We have chat restrictions, LeaverBuster and Intentional Feeder Detection. You can read more about them here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq?sort_type=recent
> 
> The quote you linked is from 2 years ago. Soon after that we implemented the chat restriction system which evaluates reports. 
> 
> Reports are being used right now for the current systems and when Tribunal comes they will be used for that as well.

**Oh come on. Stop the bullshit already.
It doesn't take two years to make a tribunal.
You can't fool 10 year olds anymore, they're 12 now. 
Jokes aside.

But in all honesty, I have a feeling most ingame reports just count towards a tally; none of what is said is actually read unless reported directly from the report link on the L.O.L support link. I know for sure you don't give a rats ass whether or not a tribunal comes.
They'll just "improve" leavebuster, restrictions and reward players with skins **

"chat restrictions, LeaverBuster and Intentional Feeder Detection."

All useless against TROLLS!

If someone runs around the map and does nothing and watches a team mate die and laugh at them, PLEASE TELL ME WHICH ONE OF THOSE USELESS SYSTEMS DETECTS THAT AND PUNISHES A TROLL??????????????

UPGRADED TO WHAT!!!!!!!

THE TRIBUNAL WAS 100% FINE BEFORE YOU REMOVED IT!

OP: Rito doesn't care.
Riot: Hey you guys said you want URF and its back. Also, check out these advertisements we are running to encourage League cosplay. Watching the LCS is completely free, unlike a lot of sports, so enjoy! You wanted less gifting restrictions? You got it!

While the Tribunal is taking ages and that does suck and I would love it if they hurried up, you are acting as if Riot does nothing at all and ignores the community completely. Its fine to be annoyed that the tribunal is taking ages, but why can't you just start a conversation where you aren't rude? A tribunal would be nice, because we'd possibly weed out the people who just want to argue, like you. And yes, I will call you a troll because it is in your name for one thing.
sorry watching sports isn't free? how about you turn the fucking tv on
the server will die if every toxic player on OCE gets banned

2 years is about 15 months too long imo

I dont believe they care
not like any server has tribunal anyway.
Eh I know it's probs gonna take a few more years for it to be done, but I'm sure they still have it in the works.
It will come eventually just give it another 2-3 years best it actually worked when we get it rather then it being crap and not working well.
